fields.Name: Face of the Mountain
fields.Description: +500 Health +100% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 400 Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 50 (+1% of your maximum Health) and grants them kill Gold. These effects require a nearby allied champion. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 4 charges. UNIQUE Active: Shield target ally for 10% of your maximum Health for 4 seconds. After 4 seconds, the target explodes dealing 100% of their total Attack Damage plus 30% of their Ability Power as magic damage in an area (60 second cooldown). Limited to 1 Gold Income item
